question: Can i just pray the Fardh and leave out the Sunnah Salaah?
answer:
QUESTION

please advise - due to time constraints at work is it accpetable to just read the fard salaah.

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatoh

 
It is highly discouraged for one to leave out the sunnah salāh. It is generally noticed that when a person becomes continuously negligent in regards to his sunnah salāh, he or she inevitably becomes negligent in his wājib and fard salāhs as well. In lieu of completely abandoning the sunnah salāh due to time constraints, we would rather encourage you to perform it at a quicker pace than your normal salāh and recite the shortest sūrahs of the Holy Qur'ān. It will take no longer than a few minutes. At times one might feel as if he or she is taking much longer; however, this is merely a devilish insinuation attempting to disturb the mind of the worshipper and lead him or her to abandoning salāh.

And Allah knows best

Wassalam

Ml. Yusuf bin Yaqub,
Student Darul Iftaa
